about_the_game:
Please note that this demo represents a pre-alpha look at the game. If you wish to avoid bugs, crashes, and performance issues, you are welcome to join the discord to receive updates on when the game reaches a more stable state.

The Following Seas demo gives you a scaled down area of the game's world.

Freely sail between four islands and landmarks on the caravel.

Fish, transport cargo, explore, battle the wind and waves, and experience the wonder of dying alone at sea.

Explore the Ashlands for an introduction to the setting and lore of this post apocalyptic sailing sim-lite.

This game is in early development, expect bugs and incomplete content. Optimization is ongoing, with the game playable on Steam Deck, but you may experience slowdown or frame drops depending on your graphical settings.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains references to alcohol, and includes alcohol as a consumable resource.

Generally mature themes are present in the narrative, including descriptions of mild violence, implied references to suicide, and natural phenomena that some players may find frightening or intense. (Sinking ships, drowning, and severe weather are present.)

There is no direct sexual content, but some artwork in the game could be considered suggestive. (Ship figureheads, statues, etc.)
